title: 271: Wedding Do’s & Don’ts
itunes:title: 271: Wedding Do’s & Don’ts
description:
It’s time for The Broads to chat - weddings! They discuss the absolute necessities, the dreaded guest list, nerves on the wedding day, if you should include your partner’s siblings, awkward wedding party moments, wearing white as a guest, wedding planners, shopping for a dress, what types of weddings they can’t stand, and much more!

*Join The Broads next Thursday as they answer #broadsquad questions about weddings, engagements, bachelor/ette parties, honeymoons, and more!

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:***FAB FIT FUN: use coupon code CHATTY for $10 off your first box at WWW.FABFITFUN.COM***OMAX OSHOT: go to OSHOTCBD.COM and enter code CHATTY to get 20% off O-Shot and sitewide!***MEJURI: Head to MEJURI.COM/CHATTY for 10% off your first order today!***BILLIE: go to MYBILLIE.COM/CHATTY***ANCIENT NUTRITION: go to ANCIENTNUTRITION.COM and enter promo code CHATTY for 20% off your first order!

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
